p:
To assess variation in species suitability between the transition Pleistocene-Holocene we mapped (1) biotic stability, number of cells where species occur in both the LGM and present-day (component A), (2) biotic gain, number of cells where species were not present in the LGM but are in present-day, (3) biotic loss, number of cells where species are present in the LGM but not in present-day (component B), and (4) the proportional loss of species, given by:
Proportional
loss =
B
A + B
.
(3)
